entries.description: The Blood War rages across battlefields of corpses and war machines.
Iron roads in deep canyons lead to the Iron City of Dis.
Acid rain falls on putrid bogs and decaying cities.
Obsidian fortresses bask in raging volcanoes and magma rivers.
Levistus's prison is a frigid hellscape of jagged ice and cold fire.
An ever-crumbling mountain threatens to bury visitors.
Swarms of hungry flies plague dead cities amid desolation.
Ice-trapped cities shelter a realm cold enough to freeze the soul.
Mighty fortresses guard the deepest pits of the Nine Hells.
